base_description: Red rectangular vending machine with dual dispensers.
part_description: Two white dispensers on the front, arranged vertically. Each dispenser has a slot beneath, positioned symmetrically. The machine is primarily red, with a rectangular shape and a flat top.
internal_interaction_description: The internal mechanism likely involves a refrigeration system to cool items and a dispensing system that releases products when a selection is made. Each dispenser is connected to a separate compartment, allowing for different products to be stored and selected independently.
external_interaction_description: Users interact with the machine by selecting a product, typically using buttons or a touchscreen interface. The machine dispenses the chosen item through one of the dispensers. It requires power to operate and may need regular restocking and maintenance by service personnel.
